target.value: one object/2 levels or 1 10-ft. square/2 levels; see text

system.shortDescription: This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.ik9u3eel5vfwrtb5]{Grease}, except as noted here. When you use this spell to cover a solid surface with slippery grease, the 10-foot squares must form a continuous area, each part of which must be within the spell's range. When you use this spell to create a greasy coating on items, no two of the targeted items can be more than 30 feet apart. You cannot target both items and surfaces with a single casting of this spell.
